thread.title_full: When Salman Khan received 10,000 letters from fans in Ahmedabad

title: When Salman Khan received 10,000 letters from fans in Ahmedabad
text: When Salman Khan received 10,000 letters from fans in Ahmedabad Monday, 26 October 2015 (13 minutes ago) Salman Khan, who recently visited Ahmedabad to promote his upcoming film 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo', received about 10,000 letters from his fans in a big box. Superstar Salman Khan is returning to filmmaker Sooraj Barjatiya’s production banner Rajshri productions with Prem Ratan Dhan Payo. Salman will kickstart his promotions for the film from Ahmedabad. Recent related news Mumbai, Oct 24 : Salman Khan, who recently visited Ahmedabad to promote his upcoming film Prem Ratan Dhan Payo, received about 10,000 love letters from his fans... newKerala.com 20 hours ago - Entertainment By Ankita Mehta Salman’s fans in Ahmedabad collected all the love letters and presented it to him before his departure from the city. …read more Source::... Filmy Friday 2 days ago - Entertainment The title track of Prem Ratan Dhan Payo already has people dancing and making dubsmash videos.
